src:
Jokić u laganom ritmu, nestvarno šutersko veče Hejvorda
06 Nov 2019, 09:38 by Darko
U NBA ligi je protekle noći odigrano šest utakmica, a od srpskih košarkaša na teren je izašao samo Nikola Jokić.
Centar Denvera je u pobedi svog tima nad Majamijem za 23 minuta imao učinak od devet poena (4/12 šut iz igre), uz po poet skokova i asistencija. Nagetse su do pobede vodili Džamal Marej sa 21 poenom i Vil Barton sa 15 poena i 10 skokova. Džimi Batler je sa 16 poena bio najefikasniji u Majamiju.
Veče je obeležio Gordon Hejvord koji je imao nestvarno šutersko veče u pobedi Bostona nad Klivlendom. Hejvord je izjednačio rekord karijere sa 39 poena, šutirajući za dva poena bez promašaja – 16/16. Kemba Voker je dodao 25 poena, dok su u Klivlendu najefikasniji bili Tristan Tompson sa 19 poena i 13 skokova i Kevin Lav sa 17 poena.



Lebron Džejms je ostvario treći uzastopni tripl-dabl u pobedi Lejkersa nad Čikagom. On je uz 30 poena, imao 11 asistencija i 10 skokova, a pratio ga je Kajl Kuzma koji je postigao 15 poena, od kojih 11 u poslednjoj četvrtini. Zek Levin sa 26 poena je bio najefikasniji u Čikagu.
Atlanta je nadigrala San Antonio uz 29 poena Tre Janga. U ekipi iz Teksasa Demar Derozan je postigao 22 poena.
Najuzbudljiviji je bio duel Šarlota i Indijane, koji je rešen posle produžetka. Devonte Grejem je sa 35 poena postavio rekord karijere i pomogao Hornetsima da slave protiv Pejsersa u čijim redovima su najefikasniji bili Ti Džej Voren sa 33 i Malkom Brogdon sa 31 poenom.
Nju Orleans je bio bolji od Orlanda, predvođen Džildžus-Aleksanderom koji je postigao 24 poena. Kris Pol je dodao 20 poena, dok je Eron Gordon sa 15 poena bio najefikasniji u Orlandu. Nikola Vučević je uz 10 poena imao i 11 skokova.
Šarlot – Indijana 122:120 (posle produžetka)Klivlend – Boston 113:119Čikago – LA Lejkers 112:118Denver – Majami 109:89Atlanta – San Antonio 108:100Oklahoma – Orlando 102:94

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
A joke at a slow pace, Hayward's unreal shooter night
06 Nov 2019, 08:38 by Darko
Six games were played in the NBA last night, with only Nikola Jokic out of the Serbian basketball court.
Downtown Denver had nine points (4/12 shot from play) in a 23-minute victory over their team over Miami, with a pair of rebounds and assists. The Nagets were led by Jamal Murray with 21 points and Will Barton with 15 points and 10 rebounds. Jimmy Butler, with 16 points, was the most efficient in Miami.
The evening was marked by Gordon Hayward having an unreal shootout night in Boston's win over Cleveland. Hayward equaled his career record with 39 points, kicking two points without a miss - 16/16. Kemba Walker added 25 points, while Cleveland's most efficient were Tristan Thompson with 19 points and 13 rebounds and Kevin Lav with 17 points.



Lebron James scored his third consecutive triple-double in the Lakers' victory over Chicago. He scored 30 points, had 11 assists and 10 rebounds, followed by Kyle Kuzma who scored 15 points, 11 of which were in the last quarter. Zack Levin with 26 points was the most efficient in Chicago.
Atlanta outpaced San Antonio with 29 points for Tre Jang. On the Texas team, Demar Derozan scored 22 points.
Most exciting was the Charlotte-Indiana duel, which was resolved after the overtime. Devonte Graham set a career record with 35 points and helped the Hornets celebrate against the Pacers, whose rankings were most effective with Jay Warren with 33 and Malka Brogdon with 31 points.
New Orleans was better than Orlando, led by Giles-Alexander who scored 24 points. Chris Paul added 20 points, while Eron Gordon with 15 points was the most efficient in Orlando. Nikola Vucevic also had 11 rebounds with 10 points.
Charlotte - Indiana 122: 120 (after extra time) Cleveland - Boston 113: 119 Chicago - LA Lakers 112: 118Denver - Miami 109: 89Atlanta - San Antonio 108: 100Oklahoma - Orlando 102: 94
